data.comment: An attacking Genk player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 5, Paul Onuachu converts the penalty to give Genk a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 47, Goal! Cyriel Dessers extends Genk's lead to 2-0.
Great play from Paul Onuachu to set up the goal.
Smail Prevljak is replacing Jonathan Heris for Eupen at Luminus Arena.
In the minute 61, Kristian Thorstvedt is on a sub for Cyriel Dessers for Genk.
Jess Thorup is making the team's second substitution at Luminus Arena with Bryan Heynen replacing Patrik Hrosovsky.
Konan N'Dri (Eupen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 71, The away team have replaced Knowledge Musona with Mamadou Kone. This is the second substitution made today by Benat San Jose Gil.
Goal! Genk extend their lead to 3-0 through Theo Bongonda.
Genk make their third substitution with Junya Ito replacing Paul Onuachu.
In the minute 81, Dries Wouters (Genk) gets a yellow card.
Nils Schouterden is replacing Adriano for the away team.
Genk take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Theo Bongonda.
The match is over. Final score 4-0.
Edo Kayembe is booked for the away team.
